error.footer: If you think this error shouldn't pop up, please use %prefix%help report

cd.message: Hey %user%!, the command %prefix%%command.name% is on cooldown
cd.title: This command is on cooldown!

wrong_usage.message:
The command `%command.name%` should not be used that way...
It should be used like this:
> %prefix%%command.name% %command.usage%
wrong_usage.title: You're using it wrong @%user.tag%!

bot_missing_permissions.message:
Oh no... I can't execute this command (`%command.name%`) because I'm missing the next permissions:
> %BotMissingPermissions%
bot_missing_permissions.title: I'm missing permissions!

user_missing_permissions.message:
Nop, nop. You can't use this (`%command.name%`) because you're missing the next permissions:
> %UserMissingPermissions%
user_missing_permissions.title: Hey @%user.tag%, you're missing permissions!
